author: mharrend
body:
In this PR besides updating of Herwig7 to Herwig7.0.4 from Herwig7.0.2,
also GoSam is added as a ME provider. This ME provider is necessary since it brings with itself the golem95 library which is also required by MG5aMC@NLO.
title: Herwig7: Adding GoSam and update to newer Herwig7 version
